meanings.definition: A public display or demonstration of a skill or item.
meanings.sent1: The school's science fair was an exhibition of students' projects.
meanings.sent2: The art exhibition at the museum featured paintings from local artists.
meanings.sent3: The exhibition of dancing cats at the circus amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was an exhibition of pure generosity.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was an exhibition of colors and lights.

meanings.definition: The act of showing or presenting something to the public.
meanings.sent1: His exhibition of magic tricks entertained the children at the party.
meanings.sent2: The exhibition of new products attracted many visitors to the trade show.
meanings.sent3: The exhibition of his dance moves left everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an exhibition of joy and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The exhibition of photographs captured moments in time beautifully.

meanings.definition: A large public event where goods or works of art are displayed.
meanings.sent1: The county fair was an exhibition of local produce and crafts.
meanings.sent2: The art exhibition in the park drew a crowd of art enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: The exhibition of giant vegetables at the fair was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was an exhibition of twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The exhibition of vintage cars showcased automotive history.
